chapters.title: Chapter 26: Discord
chapters.info: Gaidal Cain, p. 383 (337)—Character out of legend who will be called back from the dead by the Horn of Valere. A swarthy man, he carries two swords and can use them both from horseback. He is always linked to Birgitte in the stories. According to Thom, Seaghan has hired a band of people to impersonate such characters. See also Birgitte.
